EmailTemplate.name: QS Missed Followup
EmailTemplate.subject: Subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I’m sorry that I was unable to reach you. I was just calling to check in with you and get an update on your business. As your Account Manager, if there is anything I can help you with, please don’t hesitate to give me a call, and I will be happy to assist you. It has been a pleasure working with you.
Please call me directly at (855) 787-1958 x{!User.Extension} Monday–Friday from 6 am – 6 pm PT or simply reply to this message. If I’m unavailable, you can also email QuickStart@legalzoom.com to reach the next available member of my team.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.FirstName} Business Account Manager (855)-787-1958 x{!User.Extension} QuickStart@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
